findings.message:
Reentrancy in WUSDMaster.withdrawWex(uint256) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#735-739):
	External calls:
	- wex.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#736)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- WexWithdrawn(amount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#738)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in WUSDMaster.withdrawUsdt(uint256) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#728-733):
	External calls:
	- usdt.safeTransfer(strategist,amount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#730)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- UsdtWithdrawn(amount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#732)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in WUSDMaster.redeem(uint256) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#716-726):
	External calls:
	- wusd.burn(msg.sender,amount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#720)
	- usdt.safeTransfer(treasury,usdtTreasuryAmount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#721)
	- usdt.safeTransfer(msg.sender,usdtTransferAmount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#722)
	- wex.safeTransfer(msg.sender,wexTransferAmount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#723)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Redeem(msg.sender,amount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#725)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in WUSDMaster.stake(uint256) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#694-714):
	External calls:
	- usdt.safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#696)
	- usdt.safeTransfer(treasury,feeAmount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#699)
	- usdt.approve(address(wswapRouter),wexAmount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#703)
	- wswapRouter.swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens(wexAmount,0,swapPath,address(this),block.timestamp) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#704-710)
	- wusd.mint(msg.sender,amount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#711)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Stake(msg.sender,amount) (../..0xa79fe386b88fbee6e492eeb76ec48517d1ec759a.sol#713)
findings.name: reentrancy-events
